title: Hour 2 - Albert Breer
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Albert Breer
description:
Dan Patrick reacts to the news of Jimmy Garoppolo signing a restructured deal to remain in San Francisco for the time being. NFL Insider Albert Breer joins the guys to talk the latest in the NFL as teams finalize their rosters for the start of the season. Plus, one legendary sportscaster crashed Bill Belichick's press conference!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
